channel.title: Blast Pit lighting and AI bugs?
channel.description:
I've encountered a few strange bugs in blast pit, and I'm not sure what's causing them. [spoiler][img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/260461914170253384/60CEC235A426B63E9C77182A9405B91583FAD3B6/[/img][/spoiler] And[spoiler][img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/260461914170252994/E87D7100E2C7D72E5BBCC57BB7EBAF3B7A6D7868/[/img][/spoiler]
I'm thinking these might have something to do with a workshop addon I have, the Blast Pit lighting fix, but I'm not entirely sure. The other one is even stranger to me, though. The Tentacles AI seems to have glitched out, and I don't know why. It happened after I returned to the rocket silo after turning on the huge fan. [spoiler][img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/260461914170253672/9C9C4D79EFCA0CDF8156EAAB7A091ED23F4DEEB7/[/img][/spoiler] As you can see, they all seem to be stuck in the bind/ref pose, and nothing I do gets them to move. Anybody have any ideas as to why this is happening?

item.title: Blast Pit lighting and AI bugs?
item.dc:creator: Gamer_Scout
item.description:
That did it. Not sure why it was affecting the AI, I’ll try to contact the creator of that addon. Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Blast Pit lighting and AI bugs?

Disable workshop addon, test map. Does the problems still occur?

I’ve encountered a few strange bugs in blast pit, and I’m not sure what’s causing them. And

I’m thinking these might have something to do with a workshop addon I have, the Blast Pit lighting fix, but I’m not entirely sure. The other one is even stranger to me, though. The Tentacles AI seems to have glitched out, and I don’t know why. It happened after I returned to the rocket silo after turning on the huge fan.
As you can see, they all seem to be stuck in the bind/ref pose, and nothing I do gets them to move. Anybody have any ideas as to why this is happening?
